nodes.text: The legend of One Piece intro

choices.choiceText: Luffy's Encounter with Shanks: Luffy stabs his face to prove he can join, but Shanks refuses

nodes.text: Shanks still refuses and when in a bar, are they are then interrupted by the bandits headed by Higuma. Higuma demands for more drinks and insults Shanks.

choices.choiceText: Stop trying to impress Shanks. Find a boat and sail away.

nodes.text: Shanks laughs off the incident and cleans up, while Luffy gets angry and leaves.

choices.choiceText: Get angry at Shanks and leave
Laugh it off just like other Red-haired pirates.

nodes.text: Luffy's arm stretches unexpectedly, revealing he ate the Devil Fruit. The Red Hair Pirates had gone off on another voyage. Later, Higuma bandits came back.

choices.choiceText: Leave to stay out of trouble.

nodes.text: The Red-Haired Pirates later find out the Gomu Gomu No Mi was stolen from their chest. Shanks suspects the bandits.

choices.choiceText: Come out and tell that you ate the fruit in the chest.
Don't say anything because the bandits deserved punishment from Shanks.

nodes.text: Higuma kidnaps Luffy for fighting him and decides to sell him to circus because of his rubber body.

choices.choiceText: Get angry and keep insulting him.

nodes.text: Higuma gets mad and decides to kill Luffy. But Shanks and his crew come back and Higuma loses his arm in the process.
Shanks laughs it off and explains that Luffy now has a rubber body.
Shanks intimidates the bandits but finds out they weren't the culprits. Later, Luffy's rubber body is revealed and Shanks gets disappointed at Luffy's failure to be honest.
Sea King attacks and Luffy falls off a boat and drowns immediately due to a devil fruit he ate.
Higuma ties him down in his cabin. Shanks comes back to rescue Luffy and succeeds while Higuma and his crew flee.
Higuma ties him down in his cabin. Shanks comes back to rescue Luffy and succeeds while Higuma and his crew flee.
